Title: Audit of Minced Meat, Meat Preparations, Meat Products and Ready to Eat official controls system at FSA approved establishments
Objective: To review the effectiveness of minced meat, meat preparations, meat products and ready to eat official controls at FSA approved establishments in England, Wales and Northern Ireland.

Title: Asset Management Audit
Objective: To provide assurance to management on the adequacy of policies, procedures and related records maintained in connection with IT asset acquisition, tracking and disposal.

Title: FSA Official Controls for Bovine Tuberculosis
Objective: To review the effectiveness of the Food Standards Agency operational activities for bovine tuberculosis in England and Wales.
